conversations.content: Come on... Whaddya say? Go out with me.
I'm sorry, but I just don't feel that way about you.
If ya gave me a chance, I bet I could change your mind.
So c'mon, let's get outta—
She already said no. Leave her alone.
Who the hell are you? Stay outta this, you little brat.
Unless you wanna be in a world of... Oh hey, that's a real big sword.
Y-you...you a knight, then? ...Fine. I'll let you off easy this time.
*sigh* At least he finally learned when to walk away.
Are you all right, miss?
Oh, don't you worry about me. I can handle people like him easily enough myself.
Oh. Well, I suppose you didn't really need me to step in, then...
No, I didn't.
Though I did appreciate the gesture.
Say, are you doing anything right now?
I'd like to repay your kindness.
Well, if you'd like; though I didn't help you in order to be rewarded.
Come now, you don't have to hide it.
I know you only stepped in because I caught your eye. Just tell me what you'd like from me. Anything at all.
I can't really think of anything, to be honest. And I'm afraid I have to go.
Hey—wait!
No one's ever brushed me off that easily before!
Well, who'd have guessed you lived in this fancy castle.
Huh?
Oh, you're that woman from earlier... What are you doing here?
I just had to see you again.
It took me forever to find someone who could tell me where you were.
Speaking of which—you there. Thank you for guiding me.
You can go now. I have something else I have to do.
But maybe we'll see each other around.
Oh... Well, of course. I understand if you're busy...
W-well then... Farewell!
Who was that...?
My guide.
It didn't take much to convince him to bring me here.
I find most people are easily persuaded by my charms.
Except you.
What...?
When you helped me earlier, you were the perfect gentleman until the moment we parted.
No one's ever treated me like that before.
I was...curious about you.
Is that all right, Euden?
Um... Well, I don't mind if you want to stay in the castle.
Here, I'll show you around.
Who said anything about living in the castle? I'm just interested in you!
How are you not already jumping for joy? Are you actually going to make me hunt you?
Fine then. I'll stay here until I take you down!
I have finished shopping, Euden.
Where is Ranzal?
Wasn't he getting provisions with you?
I thought he was selecting weapons at the smithy with you.
No, I went alone...
Then where did Ranzal get to?
Bwa ha ha! I'm ready for seconds, shopkeep!
And bring this lovely lady some more, too!
I'd actually like to order something else to eat, Ranzal.
Their special of the day looks good...
What, that?
Yeesh, look at that price... I dunno. Are ya sure ya don't want somethin' else?
Ranzal...
You really are dashing, you know that?
Yeah? Keep that up, yer gonna make me blush...
And you've got such big, strong arms...
R-really?
Well, I do train a lot. I'm probably the strongest one outta all of us.
The more I look at you, the more wonderful things I see.
You're reliable, open-minded, mature...
Bwa ha ha! I can't take any more flatterin'!
I'm not trying to flatter you; I'm only telling you how I feel.
Anyway, about the food...
Oh, it's fine. Order whatever ya want! It's my treat!
That's so sweet of you, Ranzal! Thank you!
You truly are wonderful. They should sing songs about your generosity!
Bwa ha! Aw, it ain't a big deal!
I found Ranzal, Cleo.
Indeed...
What an unbearable scene to behold...
I cannot say I am surprised at his conduct, but this is by far the worst display I have seen yet...
Hrm...
How does he not realize that Malora is only using him for his money?
You think so? It's hard to say if she made him do it, or if Ranzal's the one who up and decided to treat her...
Has she fooled you as well, Euden?
Malora has manipulated multiple people into paying for her meals over the last handful of days.
What?! She has?
Indeed. And while it is their own fault for being so easily duped, I cannot abide such underhanded tactics.
Heh...
Still, in a way, it's impressive that she's so skilled at getting what she wants...
Hyaaaaaahh!
One of them escaped!
Watch out, Malora! It's heading straight toward you!
Silly little fiends.
Why bother attacking the village when you could have so much more fun with me?
Malora! What are you doing?!
Raaarrgghh!
Hey now, don't get snappy with me, mister. You have to be patient!
Hyah! Cease these frivolities at once!
I'm not being frivolous!
I lured them out here on purpose. It seems even fiends find me irresistible!
There is no way that's true!
You'll get yourself killed if you continue with these antics!
Oh, Elisanne.
If you don't keep your temper in check,  you'll end up scaring off all your suitors.
Wh-what does that have to do with anything right now?!
I am done listening to your non—
Graaaggghhhh!
Malora! Elisanne! Watch out!
I—
Didn't anyone teach you not to sneak up on people? How rude!
How... In one strike...
I never miss an enemy.
I never miss a lover, either.
Again with the frivolity...
And yet, you saved my life. There is no denying that.
You have my thanks. I suppose you can afford a certain degree of flippancy with such ability at your command.
That was really amazing, Malora.
Your aim was perfect, even with such a narrow window to work in.
Oh, it's nothing, really.
Next time, I think I'll aim for your heart.
Er, I think your skills would be put to better use protecting all of us.
I hope we can count on you.
*sigh* You're as elusive as ever...
I retract what I said before.
There is no place for flippancy on the battlefield.
What's this, Elisanne? Are you jealous?
Am I what?! No! I just think idle chatter distracts from the task at hand!
Hey, Malora?
Why is Elisanne's face so red?
Hm? Don't tell me you haven't realized? Oh, poor Elisanne.
In any case, you'll have to excuse me.
I have dinner plans tonight.
Euden! Might I borrow some of your time?
Malora? What are you doing up so late?
I could ask you the same!
But more importantly, why haven't YOU sought me out yet?
Um, did I...say I would do that?
Well, no...
But don't tell me you haven't noticed!
Noticed...what?
Malora? What is it? Why are you upset?
Why wouldn't I be?
I thought all the signals I was sending today had made it obvious...
Perhaps I'm not as irresistible as I believe...
Horse plop! Nobody holds a candle to ya!
Ranzal?!
Honestly, Euden!
Malora dropped so many hints, and ya didn't pick up a single one!
I have no idea what you're talking about...
You're horrible! How could you?!
What?!
Don't be upset, Malora.
He's always a bit thick in the skull when it comes to this kinda thing.
But forget about him. How about havin' dinner with me again?
I'm happy to give ya my shoulder to cry on—
Dammit! How can you say no to me?
No one has ever said no to me before you! Not a single soul!
Hey, Malora... Did ya hear me?
Oh—um... Yes. I'm sorry.
I just don't have eyes for anyone but Euden...
What?!
Euden...
I thought you were beating me at my own game, but you weren't even playing... I need to think about this.
Um... If I've hurt you somehow, I... I'm sorry.
You don't need to apologize...
I've always thought I was irresistible... It sounds silly, saying it aloud...
There have been plenty of men over the years who have interested me, but none who could outplay me...
And you weren't even aware of the game! I have a lot to think about...
Anyway... I think I'll retire for the night.
Uh...right. Good night, Malora.
So wait... I musta been playing the game, too. Guess I lost...
Um... Ranzal? I, uh... Don't be so glum, all right?
If you need a dinner partner, I'll happily accom—
Shut up! I wanted to go out with Malora!
All right, all right! Don't take it out on me!
Do you have a moment, Euden?
I've come to say my farewells.
What are you talking about?
I'm leaving.
After all, I only came to this castle to make you mine...
But now that I know my charms have no effect on you, there's no reason for me to stay.
But before I go, tell me... What is it that I'm lacking?
I don't think you're lacking in anything, Malora.
You're pretty much perfect.
Huh?
Well, you're amazing with a bow, and you have a great smile, and you never have a hair out of place...
I could go on.
What? But...
I...I'm sorry.
I didn't realize you were trying to...to win my affections.
WHAAAAT?!
It's just not the kind of thing I think about.
But my lack of awareness isn't a reflection of you, Malora.
I think you're a wonderful person.
B-but...what am I supposed to say to that?
What's wrong? You're bright red...
D-don't look at me...
Did...did I say something wrong?
N-not at all... It's just...
I'm not used to people telling me things like that...
Really? I would think you'd have heard such things a million times.
No; normally I'm the one saying them. You've caught me off guard...
Ahh, my heart is pounding again...
Then...then you DO find me charming, Euden?
Of course.
Oh... That's... I'm glad to hear that...
I...I think I'll stay in the castle after all.
You'd be helping us all out by doing so.
Don't put it like that! I want to hear how personally happy you are that I'm not leaving!
Heh. Right. Well, I'm really glad you decided to stay, Malora.
Oh, hearing that from you is so embarrassing...
I may be on my back foot now...
But I swear, one day I'll make you mine!
You can't fight it forever, Euden!
